title: Our trip to Sydney
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Education, Employment and Workplace Relations, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - New South Wales - Sydney
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Sydney (N.S.W.) - Decription and travel
abstract: A spontaneous trip that created so much happiness for one Indigenous family.
description: Bryce O'Neill-Baker tells of the time when he was asked if he wanted to go to Sydney for a short trip. The next day, he joined a bus with family members and others from his community to visit Sydney for the weekend. As well as the normal sightseeing, he also got to experience the NAIDOC festival and warmly shares the effect this time had on his family.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001903; This is me : foundation for young Australians (July 2009) : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
